You have plundered magical knowledge from a wide spectrum of disciplines. Choose two spells from any class, including this one. A spell or cantrip you choose must be of a level you can cast.

The chosen spells count as bard spells for you and are included in the number in your known Spells.

You have plundered magical knowledge from a wide spectrum of disciplines. Choose four spells from any class, including this one. A spell or cantrip you choose must be of a level you can cast.

The chosen spells count as bard spells for you and are included in the number in your known Spells.

You have plundered magical knowledge from a wide spectrum of disciplines. Choose six spells from any class, including this one. A spell or cantrip you choose must be of a level you can cast.

The chosen spells count as bard spells for you and are included in the number in your known Spells.
